name: Catarro
description:
Help Catarro in his spirtain trial. Finding all plush cats reassembling the path to his homevillage and his beloved mom. Spirtains! Au-au-tchim!

You are a baby named Catarro at the beginning of his journey through a cold land. Jump (automatically while sneeze), unlock soaring and swing hanging from your spit abilities in this 2D precision platformer game all drawn in pixel art. Venture out in search of cute plush cats that signal the right path towards your village and your mother.
